title: 日本ダービーの後に・強くなれば

text.jpText:
ゴールドシチーは『日本ダービー』を快走し、
結果を残すことができた！
text.enText:
Gold City ran a great race in the 
"Japan Derby," and was able to 
achieve a great result!

text.jpText:
ダービーウマ娘の称号は逃したが、実力は
示した。そう思っていたゴールドシチーだが、
聞こえてきた観客の声に顔をしかめた。
text.enText:
Although she lost the title of "Derby Horse 
Girl," she showed her ability. Gold City 
thought so, but she frowned when she heard 
the audience's voice.

text.jpText:
走りを賞賛されるものの、そこには必ず
『キレイ』といった外見の評価が付きまとう。
評価は変えられないのかと、彼女は呟く。
text.enText:
Although she is praised for her driving, her 
appearance, such as "beautiful," always 
accompanies the praise. She wonders if the 
evaluation can be changed.

text.jpText:
だが、まだ『菊花賞』がある。
最も強いウマ娘が勝つと言われる大舞台で、
評価をひっくり返すと意気込むのだった。
text.enText:
However, the "Kikka Sho" is still to come. 
She is eager to turn her reputation around 
on the grand stage, said to be won by the 
strongest horsegirl.

coloredText.enText:
Chrysanthemum Festival (the 9th day 
of the 9th lunar month) (one of the 
five annual festivals)
